description: This file defines a React functional component named Filters, which provides UI controls for filtering todo items (all, active, completed) and clearing completed todos. It manages rendering filter buttons with appropriate accessibility attributes and displays remaining items count.

methods.name: Filters({ activeFilter, onChange, onClearCompleted, remaining })
methods.description: React functional component rendering todo filter controls and clear completed button.

ctags.name: Filters
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Filters({ activeFilter, onChange, onClearCompleted, remaining }) {$/
